name: content-studio
description: Content Studio - AI-powered content creation microservice for Educore AI Learning Management Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
